## The machine documentation folder

Information about the [pep] virtual machine and its elements.

The file doc.dir.index.html contains a list of documents availble in this folder, including a document for each element of the virtual machine.

This folder contains information about the PEP *Parsing Engine for Patterns* virtual machine.

The document pep.machine.html contains an overview of the virtual machine, and each element of the machine (register etc) is documented in a seperate file. For example the pep *workspace* buffer is documented in the file pep.workspace.html .
